remarks: Contraction of a Sasaki projection.  (Contributed by NM, 6-Dec-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
omlspj.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
omlspj.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
omlspj.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
omlspj.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
omlspj.o $e |- ._|_ = ( oc ` K ) $.
omlspjN $p |- ( ( K e. OML /\ ( X e. B /\ Y e. B ) /\ X .<_ Y ) -> ( ( X .\/ ( ._|_ ` Y ) ) ./\ Y ) = X ) $.
